title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns a successful HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404 response.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance and access a URL with no webapps deployed, the browser displays a blank page and the HTTP response code is 200 OK.
EB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, I expect the browser to display an HTTP error 404 page and the HTTP response code to be 404.
SR:
1. Download Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL using a web browser or a tool like curl
4. Verify that the browser displays an HTTP error 404 page and the HTTP response code is 404.
